Let me explain that.

src\server\model\players\Client.java - That’s your path to the error

2284 - Thats the line of the error

How to fix it you ask? ctrl+g, enter 2284 (The line of error) and hit enter

Then add a “}”, as the compiler says.

item.title: 317 tryed to add bank sorter [gaved up]
item.dc:creator: @killerjens9 killerjens9
item.description:
@killerjens9 wrote:

[code] public class bank {
private static int bankItems[]=new int[300];
private static int bankItemsN[]=new int[300];
private static boolean auto_sort=true;

    public static void bank2() {
            for (int i=0;i<bankItems.length;i++) {
                    if (i%7==0) {
                            bankItems[i]=i;
                            bankItemsN[i]=i*i;
                    }
            }
    }
    public static void disp() {
            for (int i=0;i<bankItems.length;i++) {
                    System.out.print(bankItems[i]+"\t"+bankItemsN[i]+"\t\t");
                    if (i%4==0)
                            System.out.print("\n");
            }
    }
    public static void replace(int item, int with) {
            for (int i=0;i<bankItems.length;i++) {
                    if (bankItems[i]==item)
                            bankItems[i]=with;
            }
    }
    public static void addItem(int item,int amount) {
            for (int i=0;i<bankItems.length;i++) {
                    if (bankItems[i]==item) {
                            bankItemsN[i]+=amount;
                            return;
                    }       
            }
            for (int i=0;i<bankItems.length;i++) {
                    if (bankItems[i]==-1) {
                            bankItems[i]=item;
                            bankItemsN[i]=amount;
                            return;
                    }
            }
    }
    public static boolean deleteItem(int item, int amount) {
            for (int i=0;i<bankItems.length;i++) {
                    if (bankItems[i]==item) {
                            if (bankItemsN[i]>=amount) {
                                    bankItemsN[i]-=amount;
                                    if (bankItemsN[i]==0)
                                            bankItems[i]=-1;
                                    break;
                            } else {
                                    return false;
                            }
                    }
            }
            if (auto_sort)
                    checkBank();
            return true;
    }
    public static void checkBank() {
            //sorting
            int counter=0;
            boolean once=true;
            for  (int i=0;i<bankItems.length;i++) {
                   
                    if (bankItems[i]==-1)
                            bankItemsN[i]=-1;
                            for (int j=i;j<bankItems.length;j++) {
                                    counter++;
                                    if (bankItems[j]!=-1) {
                                            bankItems[i]=bankItems[j];
                                            bankItemsN[i]=bankItemsN[j];
                                            bankItems[j]=-1;
                                            bankItemsN[j]=-1;
                                            break;
                                    }
                                    if (j==bankItems.length-1) {       
                                            return;
                                    }
                            }
                   
            }
    }

    public static void main(String args[]) {
    bank2();
    //disp();
    replace(0,-1);//replaces the default 0's with an empty slot.
    addItem(50,50);
    disp();
    deleteItem(49,100);
    System.out.println("AFTER DELTE ITEM/AUTO_SORT");
    disp();
   }

}[/code]
